gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 120, Kings 109
gameRecap.excerpt: New York completes a 21-PT comeback to defeat Sacramento, 120-109. For New York, Jalen Brunson led the way with 35 points, 11 assists, and three steals with Josh Hart adding 31 points, nine rebounds, and eight assists in the victory. De'Aaron Fox finished with 29 points (six 3PM), seven rebounds, seven assists, and three steals while Domantas Sabonis recorded 17 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists for Sacramento in the losing effort. New York improves to 45-31, while Sacramento moves to 44-32 with the loss.
